snippet: A handful of encouraging corporate earnings reports helped turn the tide in the stock market on Thursday.
abstract: Stocks rise as higher earnings from several big companies helps investors shrug off discouraging news about jobs and retail spending.
lead_paragraph: A handful of encouraging corporate earnings reports helped turn the tide in the stock market on Thursday.

headline.main: Robust Profits Offset Weak Retail Sales
headline.print_headline: Robust Profits Offset Weak Retail Sales
